main event: A sighting of a greenish ball of fire was reported over Bill, Wyoming in December 1957.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately 10 seconds, moving at a high rate of speed., The object was at an estimated altitude of 5,000 to 10,000 feet., No sound was reported during the sighting., Weather conditions were clear at the time of the observation., The object was concluded to possibly be a balloon, meteor, or aircraft.
witness description: Mr. [redacted], who observed a fireball/bolide on December 22, 1957.
